review: Works well. Set up was a bit finnicky. It seemed to interfere with the house wi-fi connection at first. However, once everything was up and running, it has been pretty seamless.
author: Alexander Chan

review: Chromecast has doubled our movie experience.
author: Bobby J Lingle

review: With this device you convert a normal TV  to one with internet capabilities through your cell phone using Bluetooth, no need to buy a smart TV...what for?
author: JAMES BOND "007"

review: Really enjoying streaming from an Android phone and Macbook Pro. This is a must have for any home. I just use Google Chrome to stream movies from the Macbook and it can even mirror the screen on a Samsung S4.
author: JSC

review: It's easy to use from my tablet to the Tv and works great
author: Amazon Customer

review: Arraived on time. Perfect. Its great, would defenetly recomend it!
author: Victoria Pocovi
